modName: Harkons Sword No Vampire Requirements - SkyRe-friendly
summary: Allows non-Vampires to benefit from Harkon\'s sword\'s enchantment. Increases the number of charges to 50 and improves weapon stats to match the Blades Sword. SkyRe version renames the weapon to Harkon\'s Katana and allows it to benefit from Katana-specific perks.
descriptionHtml:
Allows non-Vampires to benefit from Harkon\'s sword\'s enchantment. Increases the number of charges to 50 and improves weapon stats to match the Blades Sword. SkyRe version renames the weapon to Harkon\'s Katana and allows it to benefit from Katana-specific perks.

The mod touches 2 records, the sword and its enchantment, so it should be compatible with nearly anything. Only install 1 version (though the FOMOD installer won\'t let you install both anyway...)

SkyRe version requires Skyrim Redone http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286 and was made for version 0.99.17.3. You need the Main SkyRe module installed for it to work.
author: spiderexpert
